spawn.name: Spawn Zone
spawn.description: You stand in a peaceful plaza surrounded by shimmering light. This is the beginning of your journey.

forest.name: Enchanted Forest
forest.description: Tall trees with glowing leaves surround you. The air smells of pine and magic.

desert.name: Golden Desert
desert.description: Sand dunes stretch endlessly under a blazing sun. The heat is intense.

mountain.name: Snow-Capped Mountain
mountain.description: Jagged peaks pierce the clouds above. A cold wind whips around you.

lake.name: Crystalline Lake
lake.description: Clear blue waters reflect the sky. Fish leap gracefully in the distance.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A flickering torch that provides light.

mushroom.name: Glowing Mushroom
mushroom.description: A mushroom that glows with an eerie blue light.

sand_bottle.name: Sand Bottle
sand_bottle.description: A glass bottle filled with golden sand.

cactus.name: Cactus Flower
cactus.description: A beautiful flower from a desert cactus.

ice_crystal.name: Ice Crystal
ice_crystal.description: A perfectly formed crystal of ice.

stone.name: Mountain Stone
stone.description: A smooth stone from the mountain peak.

pearl.name: Pearl
pearl.description: A lustrous pearl from the lake depths.
